verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump – my father - in - law] – [V: changed] [ARG1: the life of one woman and her family] [ARGM-TMP: last week] [ARGM-TMP: when he commuted the life prison sentence of Alice Marie Johnson , a black single mother who served more than 20 years of a horribly unjust punishment for a non - violent drug conviction] .
